titles.title: Expressing the support of the House of Representatives for innovative transformative research conducted by early career faculty, and recognizing the Research Corporation for Science Advancement (RCSA) on its 100th anniversary for supporting such research.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary: 2/15/2012--Introduced. Recognizes the importance of transformative early career scientific research. Recognizes the 100th anniversary of the Research Corporation for Science Advancement for its lasting achievements in the field of innovative scientific research.
